message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for your product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9,500 is simply too low. I'm willing to come down to $11,000 to meet you halfway. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. What do you say?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the effort. I would like to propose a price of $10,500 for your product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
